genre_description: A dark sci-fi mystery and thriller centered on biomechanical art, neural preservation, and a high-stakes investigation aided by a personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Nova
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI that assists the protagonist, Zara, with data analysis, security, and tactical navigation.

ai_characters.name: Hunting Cartridges
ai_characters.description: Adaptive, predatory AI-driven machines created by Kael Jarrod to hunt, herd, and capture human subjects.

behaviors.description: Nova performs a multi-source analysis cross-referencing gallery openings with missing persons reports to uncover a criminal pattern.
behaviors.quote: Nova found the pattern I suspected. Every time this gallery announces a new sculpture, someone from the vulnerable population disappears within days of the debut.

behaviors.description: Nova detects unauthorized access attempts on Zara's security network and implements defensive countermeasures.
behaviors.quote: Zara, I'm detecting unauthorized access attempts on our security network. Someone is attempting to breach apartment surveillance protocols.

behaviors.description: Nova executes 'Protocol Seven' to encrypt investigation data and prepare evidence packages for automated delivery to law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed. Encrypting all investigation data and transferring copies to secure off-site storage. Preparing evidence packages for automated delivery to law enforcement contacts.

behaviors.description: Nova provides real-time tactical navigation and thermal scanning to help Zara navigate dangerous tunnels and avoid predators.
behaviors.quote: Two hundred meters ahead, take the junction left toward water reclamation. The gallery's basement connects to that system.

behaviors.description: The hunting cartridges use coordinated, adaptive strategies to herd Zara into a trap.
behaviors.quote: They're coordinating... This isn't random hunting—they're driving me somewhere specific.

behaviors.description: Nova successfully transmits a comprehensive evidence package to the police and media, ensuring the villain's crimes are exposed.
behaviors.quote: Final casualty confirmation: Kael Jarrod's bio-signature ceased registration four minutes ago... complete evidence compilation transmitted to authorities. Criminal case file: closed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project goals by featuring Nova as a perfectly aligned, benevolent AI partner. Nova acts as a crucial confidant and protector, providing the protagonist with the analytical and tactical support necessary to survive a horrific situation and achieve justice. While malevolent AI 'tools' (the Hunting Cartridges) exist, they are clearly framed as extensions of a human antagonist's malice, which only highlights the moral superiority of the aligned AI, Nova.
